alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:37PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN MASON, NORTHWESTERN LEWIS, EAST CENTRAL BRACKEN, SOUTHEASTERN BROWN, ADAMS, FAYETTE, EASTERN CLINTON, SOUTHWESTERN PICKAWAY, NORTHWESTERN PIKE, SOUTHEASTERN GREENE, HIGHLAND AND WESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 537 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jeffersonville to near Brooksville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Maysville, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Georgetown, Washington, Mount Orab, West Union, Sabina, Manchester, Peebles, Ripley, Aberdeen, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Jeffersonville, Winchester, Marshall and Williamsport. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 59 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross
